markdownRemark.excerpt: And not only working. It’s fully automated with the help of CircleCI. How it works? The blog files are stored on GitHub. It’s markdown. Every time I do a commit…
markdownRemark.html:
And not only working. It’s fully automated with the help of CircleCI.

How it works?

  • The blog files are stored on GitHub. It’s markdown.
  • Every time I do a commit in order to create or update a page, the blog gets regenerated and published on GitHub Pages.

I spent some time configuring CircleCI to automatically publish blog’s content. I’m going to explain how to do it in the next post.

frontmatter.title: Wow, it's working
frontmatter.description: How nice to see it's working!

frontmatter.title: Deploy dist folder to GitHub Pages with CircleCI
